Description: JSON file for mu3e pixel configuration. Current subdivision
-SpecbookID: ID as found on specbook (valid within the layer)
-FEB_ID: FEB number, the ID of the FEB in MIDAS
-SpecbookID: Id as on specbook (valid within the ladder)
-MIDAS_ID: the ID within the FEB assigned for MIDAS (used during configuration)
-EventDisplayID: ID for the event display (unique for every chip)
Note: the key designating each layer/ladder/chip is an increasing number, but it is just for display reason.
----> always refer to the fields in the dictionaries to identify the layer/ladder/chip.
Comments: Ladder 'FEB_channel' item (during Integration Run): 4 channels per FEB, corresponding to the Samtec cable
Ladders are ordered following phi (i.e. you can find a ladder easily by searching Ladders['phi'])
